triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: The paper evaluates vision-based large language models to assess their cognitive capabilities.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: The paper studies multimodal LLMs that process both visual and textual information.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: The paper critiques deep neural network architectures and their limitations in cognitive reasoning tasks.

triples.name: Causal reasoning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes controlled experiments to evaluate and improve LLM capabilities in causal reasoning.

triples.name: Na√Øve physics
triples.relevance: The paper evaluates and aims to improve model understanding of intuitive physics through experiments.

triples.name: Theory of mind
triples.relevance: The paper proposes experimental evaluation of intuitive psychology and social understanding in vision-based LLMs.

triples.name: Visual perception
triples.relevance: The paper studies how vision-based LLMs process and interpret visual information from images.

triples.name: Social cognition
triples.relevance: The paper proposes mechanisms to integrate social cognition understanding into vision-based language models.
